items.title:
Platform 
 Integrations
description: You can now receive your discounted OptimalShip shipping rates with the following platform integrations. We have created tutorials on how to receive our discounted shipping rates with each platform.
Not finding an integration for your platform? Send us a request by clicking here.
We are continually adding more platforms. Contact IT with any platform you recommend we add.

If your platform prompts you to enter a site ID and password, you will need to register for these credentials through DHL XML Services which can be found at https://xmlportal.dhl.com/register. DHL will typically send you these credentials within 1â€“2 days.

list.title: ShipStation
list.description: This integration helps businesses with e-commerce order fulfillment and automation with a monthly subscription fee.

list.title: Shopify
list.description: This integration helps businesses with e-commerce order fulfillment and automation with a monthly subscription fee.

list.title: WooCommerce
list.description: WooCommerce, the e-commerce platform of WordPress, offers full customizability and a customer service team.

list.title: Magento
list.description: Magento Commerce, an Adobe Company, strives to give users the most customizable and engaging shopping solutions.

list.title: OpenCart
list.description: This platform offers free and open-source e-commerce with built-in SEO features, as well as a supportive community.

list.title: 3DCart
list.description: As an all-in-one software, 3DCart can help entrepreneurs who want to increase visitors, sales, and conversion rates.

list.title: Volusion
list.description: With a monthly subscription fee, Volusion offers clients who do not write code the ability to create unique e-commerce stores.

list.title: Ubercart
list.description:
Web developers can use Ubercart, 
 a selling point, with Drupal, an entire PHP platform. Ubercart also offers full customizability.

list.title: EasyCart
list.description: A Pro plugin is available that allows your customers to take advantage of OptimalShip rates at checkout.

list.title: BigCommerce
list.description: BigCommerce recently updated their API. An integration with this platform is being prepared.

list.title: PostalMate
list.description: Unable to offer our discounted rates for retail storefront operations.

list.title: WorldShip
list.description: UPS proprietarity/free software. Does not offer DHL Express integration.
